message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $11200. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a slightly firmer offer of $10800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your willingness to make a firmer offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $10800. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $11400. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more attempt to meet in the middle and offer $10900. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your willingness to make another attempt to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $10900. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $11600. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go above $10000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
